column1: 733115,Tow Truck Driver,,"Drive trucks or truck-mounted equipment
column3: Lift materials or work pieces using cranes or other lifting equipment
column11: Follow safety procedures for vehicle operation
column15: Record details of deliveries or shipments
column17: Manoeuvre vehicles into position for loading and unloading
column19: Receive information or instructions for performing work assignments
column27: Review work orders or schedules to determine operations or procedures
column31: Maintain vehicles in good working condition

column35: Inspect cargo to ensure it is properly loaded or secured
column39: Confer with clients to determine needs
column43: Communicate with others to coordinate vehicle movement",0.09647543092359144
